Name: Initiate Pipeline
Purpose: Confirm chosen technology type and collect top level  information from the database (if selected)

Name: Initiate Bathymetry
Purpose: Allow selection of bathymetry from a site chosen from the database (if selected)

Name: Initiate Dataflow
Purpose: Calculate required variables for technology and module selection and collect available data from database (if selected)

Name: Export...
Purpose: Export satisfied data to a datastate file

Name: Export (mask outputs)...
Purpose: Export satisfied data (excluding output variables) to a datastate file

Name: Import (skip satisfied)...
Purpose: Import a datastate file but do not overwrite satisfied variables
